column5: Started the day off a bit later than I wanted. (Fishing partner worked until 3am, so he had to get some sleep). Launched on Erie just before 8am. Fished until 1230. We only boated 6 fish alltogether. We fished in 14-8 FOW were using drop shot and tube jigs. All and all was a great morning. Matt got his PB smallie at 4.85 lbs. Here are some shots from the day
I hope your buddy didn't hulk smash that poor smallmouth lol!  Good fishin boys.
Nice day in the water !!! With arms like that, he would be a great musky angler
Joeytier,  Fish were handle in a respectable manner, and released quickly.
